title: Fire extinguisher inspection tags
dataVerified: Location, extinguisher serial, inspector/company, inspection date, next due date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake inspection tags. Domain binding verifies fire equipment company. NFPA 10 compliance. Fire code enforcement verification. Prevents expired extinguisher use. Building occupancy requirement.
